Package meka.gui.dataviewer

Class DataSortedTableModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
      • weka.gui.SortedTableModel
        • meka.gui.dataviewer.DataSortedTableModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, EventListener, TableModelListener, TableModel, weka.core.Undoable

    public class DataSortedTableModel
extends weka.gui.SortedTableModel
implements weka.core.Undoable
    A sorter for the Data-Viewer - necessary because of the custom CellRenderer.
    Version:
    $Revision: 12697 $
    Author:
    FracPete (fracpete at waikato dot ac dot nz)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
